snippet: Opposition activists said the incursion, in Daraya, southwest of Damascus, was the largest incursion by government forces in months.
abstract: Syrian military forces mount effort to drive back rebel forces in suburb southwest of Damascus, in what opposition activists say is largest incursion by government forces in months.

byline.original: By HWAIDA SAAD and KAREEM FAHIM

lead_paragraph: Opposition activists said the incursion, in Daraya, southwest of Damascus, was the largest incursion by government forces in months.

headline.seo: Syrian Military Mounts Offensive in Damascus Suburb
headline.main: Syrian Military Mounts Offensive in Suburb of Damascus
headline.print_headline: Syrian Military Mounts Offensive in Suburb of Damascus
